title: Government Agency
description: Represents a government agency or department.

agencyId.description: A unique identifier for the agency.

agencyName.description: The full name of the agency.

acronym.description: The common acronym for the agency (e.g., 'FEMA', 'FBI').

jurisdiction.description: The level of government the agency operates under (e.g., 'Federal', 'State', 'Local').

mandate.description: A brief description of the agency's primary mission or purpose.

parentAgencyId.description: The unique identifier of the parent agency, if applicable.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of contact numbers for the agency.

emailAddresses.description: A list of official email addresses for the agency.

type.description: The type of email address (e.g., 'general inquiries', 'media').

addresses.description: A list of physical addresses for the agency's offices.
